details.context: Action button in data table render function
Conditional draft status delete action with error color
Drawer close button in details panel header

patterns_discovered.description: All IconButton components now have matching aria-label and title attributes with identical text content
aria-labels follow imperative verb patterns: 'View', 'Edit', 'Delete', 'Close' followed by object/action name
Accessibility attributes added without functional changes, maintaining existing title attributes for tooltip behavior

gotchas_discovered.description: IconButtons with only icon children and no visible text must have aria-labels for screen reader users
Both title and aria-label attributes retained; while both serve different purposes (tooltip vs accessibility), this could be noted for future review

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully added aria-label attributes to 4 IconButton components across the RFI page
approach_outcome.completeness: Complete - all interactive icon buttons in the component now have aria-labels
approach_outcome.accessibility_impact: Positive - improves screen reader usability for users with visual impairments

recommendations.suggestion: Consider creating a reusable pattern or lint rule to enforce aria-labels on all IconButton components across the codebase
Document the aria-label naming convention for future developers (verb + object pattern)
Add automated accessibility tests to verify aria-labels are present and meaningful on icon buttons
Audit other pages for similar icon-only buttons that may need aria-label additions
